translations.section1_subtitle: FTML: Build Complex, Interactive Apps with Effortless Simplicity.
translations.section2_subtitle: Low-code approach with minimalistic logic making it easy for developers to understand and maintain. Combining imperative and declarative style creates a new way of coding in abstractive mode.
translations.section3_subtitle: Maximum speed and efficiency are achieved through continuous source-code optimizations and direct manipulation of the real DOM. By avoiding reliance on a virtual DOM and its associated overhead, this approach delivers highly responsive and performant user interfaces.
translations.section4_subtitle: Free and open source under the MIT license. Written in ECMAScript 5 for broad browser compatibility; source code is available to explore, fork, and modify as needed.
